mapper.select:
select F_FORMATYMD(PUNISHMENTYEAR,PUNISHMENTMONTH,PUNISHMENTDAY) as remark, F_LOSEPOWER(LOSEPOWERYEAR,LOSEPOWERMONTH,LOSEPOWEREDAY) || decode(FORFEIT,'0','',null,'','罚金'||FORFEIT) as SANREMARK, CRIMID, ORGID, ORGID1,LAWCASENO, CRIMEFACE, CRIMEDATE , ISMINOR, DETAINDATE, ARRESTAUTHORITY, ARRESTAUTHORITYSHORT, ARRESTDATE, BAILSTART, BAILEND, SUEORGAN, SUEORGANSHORT, SUEYEAR, SUECASENO, SUENO, PEDIGREENUM, JOINTCRIMETYPE, JOINTCRIMES, INPRISONDATE, FIRSTTRIALSUM, APPEALTYPE, APPEAL, SENTENCETYPE, JUDGMENTNAME, JUDGMENTSHORT, CASEYEAR, CASEORGSHORT, CASENO, PUNISHMENTTYPE, PUNISHMENTYEAR, PUNISHMENTMONTH, PUNISHMENTDAY, SENTENCESTIME, SENTENCEETIME, LOSEPOWERYEAR, LOSEPOWERMONTH, LOSEPOWEREDAY, FORFEIT, ISDEPORT, FORFEITUREPROPERTY, OTHER, COMPENSATION, ISREMISSION, ISPAROLE, LIMITEDREMISSION, PAYMENT, CRIMINALTYPE, ISSUEDDATE, DETAINSTATUS, FLEETYPE, ISRECIDIVISM, RECIDIVIST, CATION, MARRIAGE, ISRULING, ISTAKEEFFECT, COURTTYPE, CASETYPE, STOLENMONEY, TAKEEFFECTDATE, SANCTIONNO, CAUSEACTION, CHARGE, JUDGEDATE, WHERETO, WATCHHOUSE, DETAINTYPE, DETAINPRISON, SPECIALCRIMETYPE, FILENO, CHARGECLASS, CUSTODYTYPE, COMMUTATION, DRUGS, GUN, UNDERWORLD, WICKEDNESS, TAKEDRUGS, ESCAPES, SUICIDE, ASSAULTEPOLICE, OTHERCASE, JOBS, ISSUINGAUTHORITY, RETURNLOOT, FULFILCOMPENSATION, EXPROPRIATION, nvl(EXECUTIONDATE,sysdate) as EXECUTIONDATE, MEDIAATTENTION, FOCUS, SPECIALCONTROL, OPINION, SANCLASSSTATUS, OLDPRISONER, ILLPRISONER, DEFORMITYPRISONER, REDRUGS, CRIMES, OVERFOURCRIMES, SERIOUSVIOLATIONS, COMBINEDPUNISHMENT, MAJORCRIMINAL, STRICTLYPLOT, POSTCRIME, UNDERMINE, WIDEPLOTS, PRINCIPALACCESSORY, DECLARATIONPROPERTY, CRIMTYPE, MAINCASE, ENTRYWAYS, ISCHINESE, ISFOREIGN, ISDEATH, ALIASNO,
OPID, OPTIME,ORGNAME1,ORGNAME2,ORGID1,ORGID2,FALUNGONG,QITAXIEJIAO, casenature,qitareport,importantcriminal,prison,berth,arrestauthority_code, detainprison from TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME where CRIMID = #{crimid}
select * from TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME where FILENO = #{fileno}
select * from TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME where orgid=#{orgid}

select tb.NAME, tb.NATION as minzu, tb.nation as nation, DECODE(tb.birthday,null,'',to_char(tb.birthday,'yyyymmdd')) as cbibirthday, tb.REGISTERADDRESSDETAIL as cbinativenamedetail, tb.REGISTERADDRESSDETAIL as registeraddressdetail, tc.JUDGMENTNAME||tc.JUDGMENTSHORT as cjicourtname, tb.ADDRESSDETAIL addressdetail, F_LOSEPOWER (tc.LOSEPOWERYEAR, tc.LOSEPOWERMONTH, tc.LOSEPOWEREDAY) AS fujiaxing, tc.JUDGMENTNAME||tc.JUDGMENTSHORT text21, tb.FAMILYADDRESS as formtitle, f_getxingqi(COURTCHANGEFROM,COURTCHANGETO,1)text25, tc.CRIMEFACE as fanzuishishi, S.REWARDINFO as gzbx, s.SENTENCECHAGEINFOSHORT as prisonterm, F_FORMATYMD(s.PUNISHMENTYEAR,s.PUNISHMENTMONTH,s.PUNISHMENTDAY) as yuxing, tb.GENDER as xingbie,getage(tb.BIRTHDAY) as age, tc.CAUSEACTION as anyou,tc.CRIMEFACE as zyfzss,tb.origin as jiguan,to_char(tc.inprisondate,'yyyyMMdd') as rujiandate, to_char(tc.JUDGEDATE,'yyyyMMdd') as panjueshijian, F_FORMATYMD(tc.PUNISHMENTYEAR,tc.PUNISHMENTMONTH,tc.PUNISHMENTDAY) as ypxq, '自'||to_char(tc.SENTENCESTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd')||'至'||to_char(tc.SENTENCEETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') as xingqiqizhi, F_LOSEPOWER(tc.LOSEPOWERYEAR,tc.LOSEPOWERMONTH,tc.LOSEPOWEREDAY) as bdzzqlnl, tb.FAMILYADDRESS as jtzz from TBPRISONER_BASEINFO tb, TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME tc, TBXF_SENTENCEALTERATION s where tb.crimid=tc.crimid and tb.crimid = s.crimid and tb.crimid=#{crimid}

select tb.NAME, tb.NATION as minzu, DECODE(tb.birthday,null,'',to_char(tb.birthday,'yyyymmdd')) as cbibirthday, tb.REGISTERADDRESSDETAIL as cbinativenamedetail, tc.JUDGMENTNAME||tc.JUDGMENTSHORT as cjicourtname, F_LOSEPOWER (tc.LOSEPOWERYEAR, tc.LOSEPOWERMONTH, tc.LOSEPOWEREDAY)||decode(tc.forfeit,null,'','','','罚金'||tc.forfeit||'元') AS fujiaxing, tb.FAMILYADDRESS as formtitle, tc.CRIMEFACE as fanzuishishi, S.REWARDINFO as gzbx, s.SENTENCECHAGEINFOSHORT as prisonterm, tb.GENDER as xingbie,getage(tb.BIRTHDAY) as age, tc.CAUSEACTION as anyou,tc.CRIMEFACE as zyfzss,tb.origin as jiguan,to_char(tc.inprisondate,'yyyyMMdd') as rujiandate, F_FORMATYMD(tc.PUNISHMENTYEAR,tc.PUNISHMENTMONTH,tc.PUNISHMENTDAY) as ypxq, case when S.NOWPUNISHMENTYEAR='9995' then to_char(s.COURTCHANGEFROM,'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"') when S.NOWPUNISHMENTYEAR='9996' then to_char(s.COURTCHANGEFROM,'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"') when S.NOWPUNISHMENTYEAR='9996' then to_char(s.COURTCHANGEFROM,'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"') else '自'||to_char(s.COURTCHANGEFROM,'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"')||'起至'||to_char(s.COURTCHANGETO,'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"')||'止' end as xingqiqizhi, tc.PUNISHMENTTYPE, F_LOSEPOWER(tc.LOSEPOWERYEAR,tc.LOSEPOWERMONTH,tc.LOSEPOWEREDAY) as bdzzqlnl, tb.FAMILYADDRESS as jtzz from TBPRISONER_BASEINFO tb, TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME tc, TBXF_SENTENCEALTERATION s where tb.crimid=tc.crimid and tb.crimid = s.crimid and tb.crimid=#{crimid}

SELECT '(' || SUBSTR (uv.text6, 0, 4) || ')' || info.shortname || uv.casetype || '第' || SUBSTR (uv.text6, 5, 6) || '号' AS cbnumber, ' '||(select UV.ISREPORT from (SELECT * FROM UV_FLOW uv WHERE uv.applyid = #{crimid} AND uv.flowdefid = 'doc_bwbqzdsp' order by to_number(uv.flowdraftid) desc) where rownum=1) AS ISREPORT, info.city||'人民检察院驻监狱检察机构' as szcity FROM UV_FLOW uv, TBSYS_ORGINFO info WHERE uv.applyid = #{crimid} AND uv.flowdefid = #{flowdefid} AND uv.departid = info.orgid(+)

select decode(tc.sentencestime,null,'','自'||to_char(tc.sentencestime,'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"')||'起')|| decode(tc.sentenceetime,null,'','至'||to_char(tc.sentenceetime,'yyyy"年"MM"月"dd"日"')||'止') as xingqiqizhiri, tb.name,tb.crimid,tb.GENDER,getage(tb.BIRTHDAY) as age,tb.ORIGIN,tc.CAUSEACTION, tb.registeraddressdetail as ADDRESSDETAIL,tc.detainprison, F_FORMATYMD(tc.PUNISHMENTYEAR,tc.PUNISHMENTMONTH,tc.PUNISHMENTDAY) as yanpanxingqi, tc.JUDGMENTNAME,to_char(tc.JUDGEDATE,'yyyyMMdd') as yuanpanriqi, to_char(tc.INPRISONDATE,'yyyyMMdd') as inprisondate, F_FORMATYMD(ts.PUNISHMENTYEAR,ts.PUNISHMENTMONTH,ts.PUNISHMENTDAY) as muqianxingqi, decode(ts.sentencechageinfoshort,null,'',ts.sentencechageinfoshort) as sentencechageinfoshort from TBPRISONER_BASEINFO tb, TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME tc, TBXF_SENTENCEALTERATION ts where tb.crimid=#{crimid} and tb.crimid=tc.crimid and tb.crimid=ts.crimid

select.if: select pcodeid,codeid,name from TBSYS_CODE c where c.codetype=#{codetype}
select codeid,name from TBSYS_CODE c where c.codetype=#{codetype} and c.pcodeid=#{codeid}

mapper.select: select * from TBDATA_SENTCHAGE c where c.crimid=#{crimid} and c.category=#{category}
mapper.update: update TBDATA_SENTCHAGE set courtname=#{courtname}, courttitle=#{courttitle}, courtyear=#{courtyear}, courtshort=#{courtshort}, courtsn=#{courtsn}, category=#{category}, courtsanction=#{courtsanction}, courtchange=#{courtchange}, sentence=#{sentence}, courtchangefrom=#{courtchangefrom}, courtchangeto=#{courtchangeto}, courtarea=#{courtarea}, exectime=#{exectime} where crimid=#{crimid} and courtsanction=#{courtsanctionparameter}
mapper.select: select crimid, category, courtname, courttitle, courtyear, courtshort, courtsn, courtsanction, substr(courtchange,0,2)||'-'||substr(courtchange,3,2)||'-'||substr(courtchange,5,2) as courtchange, courtchangefrom, courtchangeto, courtarea, losepower, isdeportation, islimit, exectime from tbdata_sentchage where crimid=#{crimid} and courtsanction=#{courtsanction}

SELECT count(*) FROM TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME c,TBPRISONER_BASEINFO c1 WHERE c.crimid=c1.crimid(+)
and (c1.crimid like concat(concat('%', #{key}), '%') or c1.name like concat(concat('%', #{key}), '%'))
and (c.orgid1 IN (SELECT dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG o WHERE o.orgid = #{orgid}) OR c.orgid2 IN (SELECT dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG o WHERE o.orgid = #{orgid}))

SELECT s.crimid, s.courtname || courttitle AS courtname, s.courtyear, s.courtshort AS courtshort, s.courtsn, to_char(to_date(s.courtsanction,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtsanction, decode(to_number(substr(s.courtchange,0,2)),0,'',to_number(substr(s.courtchange,0,2))||'年')|| decode(to_number(substr(s.courtchange,3,2)),0,'',to_number(substr(s.courtchange,3,2))||'个月')|| decode(to_number(substr(s.courtchange,5,2)),0,'',to_number(substr(s.courtchange,5,2))||'天') as pundata, to_char(to_date(s.exectime,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') as execdate, to_char(to_date(s.courtchangefrom,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangefrom, to_char(to_date(s.courtchangeto,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangeto, s.category FROM TBDATA_SENTCHAGE s WHERE s.category in (1,255) and crimid=#{crimid}

select * from ( select * from ( select s.*,rownum as nums from (SELECT uv.applyid,--罪犯编号 uv.flowdraftid, uv.applyname,--罪犯姓名 cri.maincase,--罪名 CASE WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9995 THEN '无期' WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9996 THEN '死缓' WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9997 THEN '死刑' ELSE DECODE (cri.punishmentyear,0,'','', '',cri.punishmentyear || '年') || DECODE (cri.punishmentmonth,0,'','', '', cri.punishmentmonth || '个月')|| DECODE (cri.punishmentday,0,'','', '',cri.punishmentday || '天') END AS punishmentyear,--原判刑期 TO_CHAR (xf.courtchangefrom,'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangefrom,--刑期起日变动后 TO_CHAR (xf.courtchangeto, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangeto,--刑期止日变动后 CASE WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9995 THEN '无期' WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9996 THEN '死缓' WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9997 THEN '死刑' ELSE DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentyear,0,'','', '',xf.nowpunishmentyear || '年') || DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentmonth,0,'','', '', xf.nowpunishmentmonth || '个月')|| DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentday,0,'','', '',xf.nowpunishmentday|| '天') END AS courtchangeyear,--剩余刑期 TO_CHAR (cri.inprisondate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS inprisondate,--入监时间 '0' as submitstate,--提交状态 uc.intoo,--监区意见 '' as jifenkaoheqizhi,--计分考核起止 '' as yuzhengkehefen,--狱政科核分 '' as xingzhengjiangcheng,--行政奖惩 '' as yuzhengkekaohe, '' as caichanlvxingqingkuang FROM (SELECT * FROM tbflow_base WHERE flowdraftid IN (SELECT tb.flowdraftid FROM tbflow tb WHERE ( (tb.nodeid = 'N0003' AND tb.state = 0) OR (tb.nodeid = '0' AND tb.state IN (0, 2))) GROUP BY tb.flowdraftid) AND SUBSTR (text6, 0, 4) || int6 = (SELECT curyear || batch FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid =#{departid}) AND departid =#{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1)) st, UV_FLOW uv, TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME cri, TBPRISONER_BASEINFO info, TBXF_SENTENCEALTERATION xf, UV_JXJS_CASE uc WHERE st.flowdefid = 'other_zfjyjxjssp' AND ( (uv.orgid IN (SELECT org1.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org1 WHERE org1.orgid =#{orgid})) OR (uv.orgid IN (SELECT org2.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org2 WHERE org2.orgid =#{orgid}))) AND st.applyid = uv.applyid(+) AND st.applyid = cri.crimid(+) AND st.applyid = xf.crimid(+) AND st.applyid = uc.applyid(+) and st.applyid = info.crimid(+) and st.flowdraftid = uv.flowdraftid(+) and st.flowdraftid = uc.flowdraftid(+)
and (st.applyid like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%') or st.applyname like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%'))
and uc.notissue <> -1 and st.applyid not in (select crimid from NX_JXJS_CPB where curyear||batch = (SELECT curyear || batch FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid =#{departid}) AND departid =#{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) and ( (orgid IN (SELECT org1.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org1 WHERE org1.orgid =#{orgid})) OR (orgid IN (SELECT org2.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org2 WHERE org2.orgid = #{orgid}))))
union
select crimid as applyid, '0' as flowdraftid, cbiname as applyname, casemain as maincase, yuanpanxingqi as punishmentyear, to_char(xingqiqiri,'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangefrom, to_char(xingqizhiri,'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangeto, shengyuxingqi as courtchangeyear, to_char(rujianshijina,'yyyy-MM-dd') as inprisondate, '1' as submitstate, '' as intoo, jifenkaoheqizhi as jifenkaoheqizhi, yuzhengkehefen as yuzhengkehefen, xingzhengjiangcheng as xingzhengjiangcheng, yuzhengkekaohe as yuzhengkekaohe, caichanlvxingqingkuang as caichanlvxingqingkuang from NX_JXJS_CPB where liucheng IN (SELECT snodeid FROM TBFLOW_DELIVER WHERE flowdefid = 'other_jxjscpb' and state = 0 AND resid IN (SELECT ro.resid FROM TBSYS_USERS_ROLEs us, TBSYS_ROLE_RES ro WHERE us.userid = #{userid} AND us.roleid = ro.roleid)) and curyear||batch = (SELECT curyear || batch FROM (SELECT * FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid =#{departid}) AND departid =#{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) and ( (orgid IN (SELECT org1.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org1 WHERE org1.orgid = #{orgid})) OR (orgid IN (SELECT org2.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org2 WHERE org2.orgid = #{orgid}))))s
where s.applyid like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%') or s.applyname like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%')
) where nums < #{end}) where nums >= #{start}

select count(*) from (SELECT uv.applyid,--罪犯编号 uv.applyname,--罪犯姓名 cri.maincase,--罪名 CASE WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9995 THEN '无期' WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9996 THEN '死缓' WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9997 THEN '死刑' ELSE DECODE (cri.punishmentyear,0,'','', '',cri.punishmentyear || '年') || DECODE (cri.punishmentmonth,0,'','', '', cri.punishmentmonth || '个月')|| DECODE (cri.punishmentday,0,'','', '',cri.punishmentday || '天') END AS punishmentyear,--原判刑期 TO_CHAR (xf.courtchangefrom,'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangefrom,--刑期起日变动后 TO_CHAR (xf.courtchangeto, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangeto,--刑期止日变动后 CASE WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9995 THEN '无期' WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9996 THEN '死缓' WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9997 THEN '死刑' ELSE DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentyear,0,'','', '',xf.nowpunishmentyear || '年') || DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentmonth,0,'','', '', xf.nowpunishmentmonth || '个月')|| DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentday,0,'','', '',xf.nowpunishmentday|| '天') END AS courtchangeyear,--剩余刑期 TO_CHAR (cri.inprisondate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS inprisondate,--入监时间 '0' as submitstate,--提交状态 uc.intoo--监区意见 FROM (SELECT * FROM tbflow_base WHERE flowdraftid IN (SELECT tb.flowdraftid FROM tbflow tb WHERE ( (tb.nodeid = 'N0003' AND tb.state = 0) OR (tb.nodeid = '0' AND tb.state IN (0, 2))) GROUP BY tb.flowdraftid) AND SUBSTR (text6, 0, 4) || int6 = (SELECT curyear || batch FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid =#{departid}) AND departid =#{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1)) st, UV_FLOW uv, TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME cri, TBPRISONER_BASEINFO info, TBXF_SENTENCEALTERATION xf, UV_JXJS_CASE uc WHERE st.flowdefid = 'other_zfjyjxjssp' AND ( (uv.orgid IN (SELECT org1.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org1 WHERE org1.orgid =#{orgid})) OR (uv.orgid IN (SELECT org2.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org2 WHERE org2.orgid =#{orgid}))) AND st.applyid = uv.applyid(+) AND st.applyid = cri.crimid(+) AND st.applyid = xf.crimid(+) AND st.applyid = uc.applyid(+) and st.applyid = info.crimid(+)
and (st.applyid like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%') or st.applyname like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%'))
and st.flowdraftid = uv.flowdraftid(+) and st.flowdraftid = uc.flowdraftid(+) and uc.notissue <> -1 and st.applyid not in (select crimid from NX_JXJS_CPB where curyear||batch = (SELECT curyear || batch FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid =#{departid}) AND departid =#{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) and ( (orgid IN (SELECT org1.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org1 WHERE org1.orgid =#{orgid})) OR (orgid IN (SELECT org2.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org2 WHERE org2.orgid = #{orgid}))))
union
select crimid as applyid, cbiname as applyname, casemain as maincase, yuanpanxingqi as punishmentyear, to_char(xingqiqiri,'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangefrom, to_char(xingqizhiri,'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangeto, shengyuxingqi as courtchangeyear, to_char(rujianshijina,'yyyy-MM-dd') as inprisondate, '1' as submitstate, '' as intoo from NX_JXJS_CPB where liucheng IN (SELECT snodeid FROM TBFLOW_DELIVER WHERE flowdefid = 'other_jxjscpb' and state = 0 AND resid IN (SELECT ro.resid FROM TBSYS_USERS_ROLEs us, TBSYS_ROLE_RES ro WHERE us.userid = #{userid} AND us.roleid = ro.roleid)) and curyear||batch = (SELECT curyear || batch FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid =#{departid}) AND departid =#{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) and ( (orgid IN (SELECT org1.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org1 WHERE org1.orgid = #{orgid})) OR (orgid IN (SELECT org2.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org2 WHERE org2.orgid = #{orgid}))))
where applyid like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%') or applyname like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%')

select count(*) from ( select crimid as applyid, flowdraftid as flowdraftid, cbiname as applyname, casemain as maincase, yuanpanxingqi as punishmentyear, to_char(xingqiqiri,'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangefrom, to_char(xingqizhiri,'yyyy-MM-dd') as courtchangeto, shengyuxingqi as courtchangeyear, to_char(rujianshijina,'yyyy-MM-dd') as inprisondate, '1' as submitstate, '' as intoo, yuzhengkehefen, yuzhengkekaohe, jifenkaoheqizhi, xingzhengjiangcheng from NX_JXJS_CPB where liucheng IN (SELECT snodeid FROM TBFLOW_DELIVER WHERE flowdefid = 'other_jxjscpb' and state = 0 and departid = #{departid} AND resid IN (SELECT ro.resid FROM TBSYS_USERS_ROLEs us, TBSYS_ROLE_RES ro WHERE us.userid = #{userid} AND us.roleid = ro.roleid)) and curyear||batch = (SELECT curyear || batch FROM (SELECT * FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid =#{departid}) AND departid =#{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) and ((orgid IN (SELECT org1.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org1 WHERE org1.orgid = #{orgid})) OR (orgid IN (SELECT org2.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org2 WHERE org2.orgid = #{orgid}))))
where applyid like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%') or applyname like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM tbxf_commuteparole_batch WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid = #{departid}) AND departid = #{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

select cbiname, gender, nation, to_char(birthday,'yyyy-MM-dd') as birthday, casemain, yuanpanxingqi, xingqibiandong, jibie, to_char(xingqiqiri,'yyyy-MM-dd') as xingqiqiri, to_char(xingqizhiri,'yyyy-MM-dd') as xingqizhiri, shengyuxingqi, to_char(rujianshijina,'yyyy-MM-dd') as rujianshijina, jifenkaoheqizhi, yuzhengkehefen, xingzhengjiangcheng, yuzhengkekaohe, caichanlvxingqingkuang, reportid, orgid, crimid, curyear, batch, remark from NX_JXJS_CPB where curyear=#{curyear} and batch=#{batch} and crimid=#{crimid}

SELECT uv.applyid as crimid,--罪犯编号 uv.flowdraftid as flowdraftid,--流程草稿id uv.flowdefid as flowdefid,--流程自定义id uv.applyname as cbiname,--罪犯姓名 info.gender as gender,--性别 info.nation as nation,--民族 to_char(info.birthday,'yyyy-MM-dd') as birthday,--出生日期 cri.maincase as casemain,--罪名 CASE WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9995 THEN '无期' WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9996 THEN '死缓' WHEN cri.punishmentyear = 9997 THEN '死刑' ELSE DECODE (cri.punishmentyear,0, '',cri.punishmentyear || '年') || DECODE (cri.punishmentmonth,0, '', cri.punishmentmonth || '个月')|| DECODE (cri.punishmentday,0, '',cri.punishmentday || '天') END AS yuanpanxingqi,--原判刑期 xf.sentencechageinfoshort as xingqibiandong,--刑期变动 '' as jibie,--级别 TO_CHAR (xf.courtchangefrom,'yyyy-MM-dd') as xingqiqiri,--刑期起日变动后 TO_CHAR (xf.courtchangeto, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as xingqizhiri,--刑期止日变动后 CASE WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9995 THEN '无期' WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9996 THEN '死缓' WHEN xf.nowpunishmentyear = 9997 THEN '死刑' ELSE DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentyear,0,'','','',xf.nowpunishmentyear || '年') || DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentmonth,0, '','','', xf.nowpunishmentmonth || '个月')|| DECODE (xf.nowpunishmentday,0,'','', '',xf.nowpunishmentday|| '天') END AS shengyuxingqi,--剩余刑期 TO_CHAR (cri.inprisondate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS rujianshijina,--入监时间 '' as jifenkaoheqizhi,--计分考核起止 '' as yuzhengkehefen,--狱政科核分 '' as xingzhengjiangcheng,--行政奖惩情况 '' as yuzhengkekaohe, --狱政科审核 '' as caichanlvxingqingkuang,--财产履行情况 uc.intoo,--监区意见 ROWNUM AS rn FROM (SELECT * FROM tbflow_base WHERE flowdraftid IN (SELECT tb.flowdraftid FROM tbflow tb WHERE ( (tb.nodeid = 'N0003' AND tb.state = 0) OR (tb.nodeid = '0' AND tb.state IN (0, 2))) GROUP BY tb.flowdraftid) AND SUBSTR (text6, 0, 4) || int6 = (SELECT curyear || batch FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE curyear = (SELECT MAX (curyear) FROM TBXF_COMMUTEPAROLE_BATCH WHERE departid =#{departid}) AND departid =#{departid} ORDER BY batch DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1)) st, UV_FLOW uv, TBPRISONER_BASE_CRIME cri, TBPRISONER_BASEINFO info, TBXF_SENTENCEALTERATION xf, UV_JXJS_CASE uc WHERE st.flowdefid = 'other_zfjyjxjssp' AND ( (uv.orgid IN (SELECT org1.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org1 WHERE org1.orgid = #{orgid})) OR (uv.orgid IN (SELECT org2.dorgid FROM TBFLOW_ORG_ORG org2 WHERE org2.orgid = #{orgid}))) and st.applyid= #{crimid} AND st.applyid = uv.applyid(+) AND st.applyid = cri.crimid(+) AND st.applyid = xf.crimid(+) AND st.applyid = uc.applyid(+) and st.applyid = info.crimid(+) and st.flowdraftid = uv.flowdraftid(+) and st.flowdraftid = uc.flowdraftid(+) and uc.notissue <> -1
select * from NX_JXJS_CPB where crimid=#{crimid} and curyear=#{curyear} and batch=#{batch} and reportid=#{reportid}
mapper.update: update NX_JXJS_CPB set cbiname=#{cbiname}, gender=#{gender}, nation=#{nation}, birthday=to_date(#{birthday},'yyyy-MM-dd'), casemain=#{casemain}, yuanpanxingqi=#{yuanpanxingqi}, xingqibiandong=#{xingqibiandong}, jibie=#{jibie}, xingqiqiri=to_date(#{xingqiqiri},'yyyy-MM-dd'), xingqizhiri=to_date(#{xingqizhiri},'yyyy-MM-dd'), shengyuxingqi=#{shengyuxingqi}, rujianshijina=to_date(#{rujianshijina},'yyyy-MM-dd'), jifenkaoheqizhi=#{jifenkaoheqizhi}, yuzhengkehefen=#{yuzhengkehefen}, xingzhengjiangcheng=#{xingzhengjiangcheng}, yuzhengkekaohe=#{yuzhengkekaohe}, caichanlvxingqingkuang=#{caichanlvxingqingkuang}, reportid=#{reportid}, remark=#{remark} where crimid=#{crimid} and curyear=#{curyear} and batch=#{batch}
mapper.insert: insert into NX_JXJS_CPB (cbiname,gender,nation, birthday,casemain, yuanpanxingqi,xingqibiandong, jibie,xingqiqiri, xingqizhiri,shengyuxingqi, rujianshijina,jifenkaoheqizhi, yuzhengkehefen,xingzhengjiangcheng, yuzhengkekaohe,caichanlvxingqingkuang, reportid,orgid,crimid,curyear,batch,remark,liucheng,flowdraftid) values( #{cbiname},#{gender},#{nation}, to_date(#{birthday},'yyyy-MM-dd'),#{casemain}, #{yuanpanxingqi},#{xingqibiandong}, #{jibie},to_date(#{xingqiqiri},'yyyy-MM-dd'), to_date(#{xingqizhiri},'yyyy-MM-dd'),#{shengyuxingqi}, to_date(#{rujianshijina},'yyyy-MM-dd'),#{jifenkaoheqizhi}, #{yuzhengkehefen},#{xingzhengjiangcheng}, #{yuzhengkekaohe},#{caichanlvxingqingkuang}, #{reportid},#{orgid},#{crimid},#{curyear},#{batch},#{remark},#{liucheng}, #{flowdraftid} )
